snippet: Frank Joseph James Lynch died Tuesday at a nursing home in Dearborn, Mich., at 95, having spent a remarkable 63 years connected with the Detroit Red Wings.
abstract: Box Seats article remembers Detroit Red Wings public-address announcer Budd Lynch, who died at age 95 having spent a remarkable 63 years connected with the Red Wings.
lead_paragraph: Frank Joseph James Lynch died Tuesday at a nursing home in Dearborn, Mich., at 95, having spent a remarkable 63 years connected with the Detroit Red Wings.

headline.main: Detroit’s Voice of Hockey Leaves a Sad Silence
headline.print_headline: Detroit’s Voice of Hockey Leaves a Sad Silence
